intro: Hello! I'm Abhijit Turate, a Software Engineer from Virar, India.
aboutMe: I am focused person who always works hard to achieve goals demonstrates a strong work ethic and creative ability and has never failed to meet an assignment deadline. I seek to apply my programming/developing skills and creative mindset to create something that could be a part of a much more excellent idea and be helpful for all.
hobbies: When I'm not coding, I play outdoor games with my friends , watch some shows on amazon Prime or Netflix and if the weather's good, explore some hidden places.
